snippet: The Office of the Director of National Intelligence released an official count for the number of civilian and combatant casualties from airstrikes outside of war zones from 2009 to 2015. President Obama also issued an executive order requiring the...
lead_paragraph: The Office of the Director of National Intelligence released an official count for the number of civilian and combatant casualties from airstrikes outside of war zones from 2009 to 2015. President Obama also issued an executive order requiring the government to release an annual set of such numbers going forward. In addition, the White House released a fact sheet describing the policy.

headline.main: Obama Administration Releases Death Toll from Airstrikes
